0.Pros: Great restaurant. Intro to the fast food industry.
0.Cons: Don't get paid super high but it's expected. Not a top job by any means.

1.Pros: Not really much to say here, typical fast food job. The main pro is that these jobs are easy to get.
1.Cons: Service industry is not fun. Sometimes the hours can be a bit unflexible. You may also get unlucky and have a bad shift.

2.Pros: Free uniforms fun place to good customers
2.Cons: Long hours no understanding to family

3.Pros: Meet interesting people, gain cash handling skills
3.Cons: Having to clean the fry vats, I burnt myself multiple times. So much grease and waste.

4.Pros: It is a great place for advancement in a company. The people you work with and the customers are great.
4.Cons: Some of the down sides are when there aren't enough staff on duty during rush hour times. Or they aren't trained properly.

5.Pros: flexible schedule and can be fun to work
5.Cons: managers can be mean, not very fun

6.Pros: Fast Friday. Free food. Exciting customers
6.Cons: Low pay for hard work. Unappreciative people.

7.Pros: The job was dumbed down tremendously. The drink machine made all the drinks and the fry machine was easy to do. If you have a brain you can work here.
7.Cons: The coworkers I had were not very good. Some of my coworkers were very hard workers, but some workers were there just to stand around and be rude to customers.

8.Pros: Love the people and also a fast paced environment that teaches how to work in any situation.
8.Cons: Stressful after long periods and heavy foot traffic

9.Cons: i hate people and working here
